title: Latency Issues in League Only
body:
Recently, I've been getting terrible latency issues when playing League of Legends.  This only happens when playing League, and normally around 11PM Central Time.  I normally average around 45ms ping, but when it gets bad it never goes below 150, typically hovers around 250, and frequently spikes up to 330.  I can run a speedtest to a Chicago-area server and get 50-60ms ping and 80mbps/8mbps down/upload speeds while getting these bad latency periods.

Here's a tracert that I just ran; you can see I have no issues until I hit riotdirect.

  1    <1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  192.168.0.1
  2    12 ms    22 ms     9 ms  cpe-70-121-192-1.satx.res.rr.com [70.121.192.1]

  3    27 ms    20 ms    23 ms  tge0-0-1.snaxtx4001h.texas.rr.com [24.28.134.177
]
  4    42 ms    32 ms    37 ms  agg21.snaptx1901r.texas.rr.com [24.175.33.72]
  5    11 ms    12 ms    11 ms  agg22.snavtxuu02r.texas.rr.com [24.175.32.160]
  6    15 ms    15 ms    16 ms  agg23.hstqtxl301r.texas.rr.com [24.175.32.156]
  7    19 ms    15 ms    23 ms  bu-ether16.hstqtx0209w-bcr00.tbone.rr.com [66.10
9.6.108]
  8    24 ms    23 ms    23 ms  bu-ether12.dllstx976iw-bcr00.tbone.rr.com [66.10
9.6.39]
  9    19 ms    23 ms    17 ms  0.ae4.pr1.dfw10.tbone.rr.com [107.14.19.97]
 10    22 ms    18 ms    24 ms  24.27.236.233
 11    25 ms    19 ms    24 ms  104.160.134.35
 12   433 ms   428 ms   399 ms  ae35-br02.chi01.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.24]

 13    40 ms    39 ms    38 ms  ae1-br01.chi01.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.8]
 14   458 ms   484 ms   459 ms  104.160.131.1

Any idea how to fix this?

replies.body: Based on these logs, it looks like there's an issue on node 11 that's having problems sending information to 12 which is riot direct.  You should to hit up your ISP if this is still an issue, and share this information with a technician so they can take a look at it.  Hopefully everything is  okay now!
My ISP said that this is an issue with Riot's network.  They said that all the problem nodes, starting with 104.160.134.35, are registered to Riot and outside their network.
